title: Pizza pasta
ingredients: ['450g rigatoni pasta', '900g Italian sausage', '2 onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 green pepper, chopped', '450g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes, undrained', '300g tomato puree, or to taste', '100g sliced pepperoni', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '225g diced pepperoni', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste']
